div.p: GIVEN is the sub-element capturing all of a person's first and middle names (everything but their surname/s and/or nickname/s), a part of Birthname within the big-bucket element PERSONNAME, in the Biography section of entries. It is used once or several times (occasionally not at all) depending upon how many given names a person has. It has one optional attribute, REG, which allows you to standardize the given name. There will be some cases where, for instance, there is a discrepancy in spelling: Laetitia for Letitia: use Reg to indicate which you think is the standard spelling, and you will also want to add a scholar's note explaining the details of the discrepancy.
See PERSONNAME for general name practices.
Open new tag for each given name.
Enter her given names with no spacing between names. BIRTHNAME will be processed electronically with spaces.
Given names go before surname in the order of first name followed by middle names.
The complete BIRTHNAME, including multiple Given names, goes in one DATAITEM.
